comment1: Appears in the refugee center as a source of missions and info.  Faction critical.
comment2: name+ is appended to the end of the npc's name.  If you remove the comma it sets the name as is.
comment3: Class is based on the enum in npc.h.  The important ones are 0=NC_NONE, 2=NC_SHOPKEEP,
comment6: Attitude is based on the enum in npc.h.  The important ones are 0=NPCATT_NULL, 1=NPCATT_TALK
comment8: Mission is based on the enum in npc.h.  The important ones are 0=NPC_MISSION_NUL, 3=NPC_MISSION_SHOPKEEP
comment10: Mission_offered is based on the enum mission_id in mission.h.  0=MISSION_NULL
